Detailed Description

CPuzzleView.

Description: This class contains the graph and trace views used while working on a puzzle style dataset. It lays out the two views as a QSplitter to give the user control of each one's size. By default the QSplitter holds the views as non-collapsible and so it is recommended that the programmer connect toggle actions to show/hide the views through the connectGraphAction and connectTraceAction functions;

Limitations: None

void CPuzzleView::signalRepaint (  void   )  [virtual]
 

CPuzzleView::signalRepaint.

Description: This function tells the graph and trace views that they need to redraw because a parameter has changed in the style tool kit.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
The graph and trace view are redrawn.
Limitations: None

Implements IGNATView.
